q: Jack White and Co. rocked David Letterman 's world Thursday night with their smoking cover of Johnny Kidd and the Pirates'`` Shakin' All Over.'' David Letterman could barely speak after their rollicking rendition came to and end, exclaiming Holy crap! Whoa! and asking them to resume playing to close of the show, which was running a little over. The band was tight, Jack White scorched his guitar solos and`` The Sweet Lady with the Nasty Voice

Bill Cosby 's Sunday show at Wolfe Auditorium will be similar to late-night appearances with Jay Leno and David Letterman , he said.`` I come out and sit down,'' he said. I've been doing that since I was 34, and I'm 73 now. And I'll begin to tell stories. Bill Cosby said his mission is simple- to leave the audience laughing and thinking that`` I am not alone.
